title: Bro WTF Fix ya Shit.
body: Bro. you nobs owe me 2 boxes, still havent received the box for lucian game s- from 2 days ago. and just got cheated out of another box for getting s with olaf i just finished. you guys are shit %%%%s. your hextech system is SHIT and your reply system on this crap is even more SHIT. RIOT IS SHIT.

replies.body:
There's a few things that could've happened here:

+ _Have you gotten 4 chests in the past month? _
 You can only earn 4 chests per month, once you pass that limit you can't receive anymore chests for a week.


+ _Have you received a chat restriction or ban recently?_
 Getting punished by any system except for [LeaverBuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will result in your Hextech Rewards being taken away for a while.

If none of those apply to your case then let me know :D

Thanks for getting back. no i haven't received any boxes for a while as i have boxes with all champs i play so its down to champs i dont play, i have 4 available, and yes i have leaverbuster banned, didnt know it affects hextech boxing sorry. my mistake.
